name: Fruit Hunter (itch)
description:
Fruit Hunter is a point and click styled PC game that is and always will be free for anyone to play! The Goal is to catch fruits to earn score, while avoiding bombs that randomly spawn every 2 seconds!

The game has been in development for more than a year now of on and off progress, we are excited to announce the official stable release coming soon!

Current Build: Release 1.0.0.1 (Hotfix) [Release 4/6/14]

We are Hexxium Games and we develop free games that anyone can play! 

Visit our website for more details!
